main event: A single unidentified flying object showing a steady, white light was observed in the sky at coordinates 00-49S 170-24W.
interesting points: The object appeared at bearing 335 degrees at an altitude of 20 degrees, traveling rapidly from north-north-east to south-south-east.
The object disappeared at bearing 120 degrees at an altitude of 15 degrees.
The object's movement and trajectory was consistent with a satellite, but satellite track data was not available.
The report concludes the object was of 'unknown' origin.
sighted object: a single unidentified flying object showing a steady, white light
photographs: no, the report does not include any photographs
